value.string:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" 
 xmlns:md5="http://exslt.org/crypto" exclude-result-prefixes="md5"
 xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">
 
 <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes" omit-xml-declaration="no"/>
 
 <!--Parameters list-->
 <xsl:param name="rid" select="None"/>
 <xsl:param name="sid" select="None"/>
 <xsl:param name="categories_list" select="None"/>
 <xsl:param name="subject_list" select="None"/>
 <xsl:param name="actor" select="None"/>
 
 
 <!--Template matching the erp5 Tag-->
 <xsl:template match="/">
 <erp5>
 <xsl:apply-templates select="//item|//entry"/> 
 </erp5>
 </xsl:template>
 
 <!--Template maching the item Tag-->
 <xsl:template match="item|entry">
 <xsl:variable name="md5_id">
 <xsl:choose>
 <xsl:when test="title|dc:title"><xsl:value-of select="title|dc:title"/></xsl:when>
 <xsl:when test="link"><xsl:value-of select="link|link/@href"/></xsl:when>
 <xsl:otherwise><xsl:value-of select="description|dc:description"/></xsl:otherwise>
 </xsl:choose>
 </xsl:variable>
 <xsl:variable name="converted_id" select="md5:md5($md5_id)"/>
 <object id="{$converted_id}" portal_type="RSS Item">
 <id type="string"><xsl:value-of select="$converted_id"/></id>
 <rid type="string"><xsl:value-of select='$rid'/></rid>
 <categories_list type="tokens"><xsl:value-of select="$categories_list"/></categories_list>
 <title type="string"><xsl:value-of select="title|dc:title"/></title>
 <subject_list type="lines"><xsl:value-of select="$subject_list"/></subject_list>
 <description type="text"><xsl:value-of select="description|dc:description|content"/><xsl:apply-templates select='summary'/></description>
 <url_text>
 <xsl:choose>
 <xsl:when test="link"><xsl:value-of select="link"/></xsl:when>
 <xsl:otherwise>None</xsl:otherwise>
 </xsl:choose>
 </url_text>
 <pub_date><xsl:value-of select="pubDate|dc:date"/></pub_date>
 <workflow_action id="edit_workflow">
 <action type="string">edit</action>
 <actor type="string"><xsl:value-of select='$actor'/></actor>
 <comment type="string"></comment>
 <error_message type="string"></error_message>
 <serial type="string">0.0.0.0</serial>
 <state type="string">current</state>
 <time type="date"><xsl:value-of select="pubDate|dc:date"/></time>
 </workflow_action>
 </object>
 </xsl:template>
 
 <xsl:template match="summary">
 <xsl:apply-templates/>
 </xsl:template>
 
 </xsl:stylesheet>
